name: Adobe InDesign Library
summary: Learn about .INDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can create an INDL file by highlighting one or more objects and then selecting File → New → Library. You can add or remove individual objects to an open object library using the Library panel.
InDesign also supports Creative Cloud (CC) INDL libraries. These libraries allow you to share content with other InDesign users.

instructions: You can open INDL files with Adobe InDesign in Windows and macOS by selecting File → Open.... You can also double-click an INDL file if it is associated with InDesign. Opened libraries appear on the Object Library panel in the InDesign user interface.
NOTE: When opening an INDL file from an older software version, InDesign automatically converts the object library to the most recent format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
